20110121010743.000|20110121010745.000|CC1|REPRESENTS THE AREA.            
20110121010745.000|20110121010747.000|CC1|IT WAS AN EXTRAORDINARY SHOW OF 
20110121010747.000|20110121010748.000|CC1|COORDINATION AND COOPERATION AND
20110121010748.000|20110121010750.000|CC1|WANT TO THANK YOU.              
20110121010750.000|20110121010752.000|CC1|I ALSO WANT TO THINK THE PUBLIC 
20110121010752.000|20110121010752.000|CC1|FOR THEIR PATIENTS TO THE MOST  
20110121010752.000|20110121010754.000|CC1|IMPORTANT THING TO REMEMBER WAS 
20110121010754.000|20110121010757.000|CC1|THERE WAS AN INDIVIDUAL WHO WAS 
20110121010757.000|20110121010758.000|CC1|CALLOUS ENOUGH TO BE ABLE TO    
20110121010758.000|20110121010801.000|CC1|SHOOT A                         
20110121010801.000|20110121010802.000|CC1|POLICE OFFICER ARMED AND        
20110121010802.000|20110121010803.000|CC1|AT LOOSE IN THE NEIGHBORHOOD.   
20110121010803.000|20110121010804.000|CC1|OUR FIRST BREWERY WAS TO MAKE   
20110121010804.000|20110121010805.000|CC1|SURE NOT ONLY THAT ALL THOSE    
20110121010805.000|20110121010806.000|CC1|PEOPLE WERE                     
20110121010806.000|20110121010807.000|CC1|SAVED, BUT ANY OF               
20110121010807.000|20110121010809.000|CC1|THE SCHOOLS NEARBY THAT THE     
20110121010809.000|20110121010809.000|CC1|CHILDREN                        
20110121010809.000|20110121010810.000|CC1|WERE SAFE AS WELL.              
20110121010810.000|20110121010812.000|CC1|THANK YOU FOR THE WORK THAT     
20110121010812.000|20110121010813.000|CC1|HAPPENED.                       
20110121010813.000|20110121010815.000|CC1|WHEN SOMEBODY LIKE THIS ASSAULTS
20110121010815.000|20110121010816.000|CC1|A POLICE OFFICER HE ASSAULTS ALL
20110121010816.000|20110121010817.000|CC1|OF US.                          
20110121010817.000|20110121010818.000|CC1|IT IS IMPORTANT FOR US TO       
20110121010818.000|20110121010820.000|CC1|RESPOND IMMEDIATELY TO ACTS OF

20110121010825.000|20110121010826.000|CC1|HAVE.
